description: "Small notes on this map of Burmah (Myanmar) describe mines, crops and products produced, names of local tribes etc. e.g.: ‘a passage to Rangoon in the wet season’, ‘Ship of 400 tons built here’, ‘Alompra’s birth place’, ‘Gold dust in the streams’."
title: "Map of Burmah, : and adjacent countries, compiled from various MS and other documents [cartographic material]"
